sentence: He worried that the GOP was “on the wrong side of history” on the issue, said Cox, who is no longer close with Mandel and has donated to two of his 2022 rivals, Republican Matt Dolan and Rep. Tim Ryan, the front-runner for the Democratic nomination.
title: Josh Mandel foreshadowed Trump’s rise. His Ohio Senate bid is a test of what’s next.

sentence: Ohio's one lost congressional seat is subtracted in the Akron area, where the once reliably safe districts of Democratic U.S. Rep. Tim Ryan and Republican U.S. Rep. Anthony Gonzalez were merged into a single district leaning 4.3% Democratic.
author: The Associated Press
title: Ohio mapmakers OK 2nd congressional map over Dem objections

sentence: U.S. Rep. Tim Ryan (D., Warren) launched a new ad Friday in his campaign for U.S. Senate that highlighted some of the leading talking points he’s brought with him on the road across Ohio.
author: Trevor Hubert
title: Ryan highlights middle-class issues in latest TV ad
